name: Lime Odyssey: The Chronicles of ORTA
name_original: Lime Odyssey: The Chronicles of ORTA
description:
Lime Odyssey: The Chronicles of ORTA is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Sirius Entertainment. It came out on 15-11-2011. Aeria Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Lime Odyssey: The Chronicles of ORTA on PC.
